acupoint.standard_location: 在踝区，内踝尖与跟腱之间的凹陷中
acupoint.standard_location_en: In the depression between the tip of the medial malleolus and the Achilles tendon
acupoint.simple_method: 内脚踝骨最高点与跟腱之间的凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Find the hollow between the inner ankle bone and the Achilles tendon.
indications: 肾虚腰痛 (kidney deficiency back pain)
functions: 滋阴益肾 (nourish yin, benefit kidney)
清热降火 (clear heat, reduce fire)
强腰壮骨 (strengthen lumbar and bones)
